text: Novoyamashevo () is a rural locality (a village) in Krivle-Ilyushkinsky Selsoviet, Kuyurgazinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 71 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 27 km from Yermolayevo, 4 km from Krivle-Ilyushkino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kuyurgazinsky District
title: Novoyamashevo
